name: Orb of Venom
description: Envenoms your veapon with the venom of a venomous viper.

abilities.name: Poison Attack
abilities.description: The next attack poisons the target, dealing damage over time.
notes: The effects are calculated upon reaching the attack point, not upon landing an attack. For ranged heroes, this is upon projectile launch.
Reapplying the debuff refreshes the duration.
Does not affect Buildings, Ward-type units, or Ally units
The attacks first apply the debuff, then their own attack damage
Deals damage in 1-second intervals, starting 1 second after the debuff is applied, resulting in 3 instances
Can deal up to 30 damage (before reductions)
The damage from Poison Attack is direct HP Removal, so it does not trigger any on-damage effects

additionalInfo: Generally picked up by melee heroes who intend to harass their opponents in the lane
Does not pierce Debuff Immunity sources
This ability is not bestowed by Illusions
Creates debuff modifier_item_orb_of_venom_slow that is dispellable by any Dispel sources
